effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.2 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 589,623.

Set: When your Power Word: Shield is completely absorbed on an ally, they are granted Insurance! at 40% effectiveness. Allies with your Insurance! or absorption effects receive 15% increased healing from you.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Hood of Blind Absolution

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Offer to bind your spirit with that of another player also wearing this ring. This binding is permanent, but can be severed at the cost of 1 Blasphemite. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to empower each unique gem color of an ally's socketed gems. This boon grants 391 to each empowered secondary stat for 15 sec. This effect will always target your bonded ally, if able.

Equip: Your spells have a chance to charge the device and request a Backfill Barrel near your target's location. Damaging the barrel causes it to explode, inflicting 598,908 Fire damage split between nearby enemies.
Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to let loose a nascent empowerment from the crystal, increasing a random secondary stat by 3,329 for 20 sec.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Shawl of Blind Absolution

spells.description:
Equip: Every 10 seconds in combat take 1% of your maximum Health as Nature damage and gain a stack of Symbiosis, granting 146 Versatility for 20 sec stacking up to 5 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
